82966.summary: Some customers in Portage la Prairie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82966.title: Sept 11 - Portage la Prairie | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

82969.title: Sept 11 - Calgary (Sandstone) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
